modName: MLU and improved closedfaced helmets patch
summary: fixes issues with balancing and missing head textures
descriptionHtml:
fixes issues with balancing and missing head textures, changes from MLU should now carry over, as well as have open helmets without missing head meshes

this changes all of the dragon masks, the ebony helmet, and the daedric helmet

requries update.esm, and dragonborn.esm as well as both mods stated

merge with bash.

Changes: 
Masks, Ebony and Daedric helmet now uses proper ICH meshes
value changed to reflect MLU
Armor type changed to reflect MLU
armor rating changed to reflect MLU
vendor types changed to reflect both MLU and ICH
names changed to reflect MLU
Descriptions changed to reflect MLU

to navida1 and/or ChocolateNoodle
you have full permission to use this for a patch option or upload it on your page, you dont have to ask me, but tell me if you do so i can remove this page and reduce clutter
author: navida1 ChocolateNoodle Xepherxv
